column4: is there someone who can help me with a big dependency problem?
you've got to say what the problem is
describe the problem to the channel
all on one line please
sounds like you are on feisty
learn how to use apt properly when you're offline, e.g. from http://www.batmat.net/apt-offline/
it avoids unexpected problems like yours
what version of ubuntu are you running?
dapper
which version of python-minimal have you downloaded?
2.4.2-0ubuntu3 or 2.4.3-11ubuntu3 ?
2.4.2-0ubuntu3
have you tried removing that package?
the package that is broken is "python"
and it wants to remove over 240 other files
I know. Answer my question please
how do i remove it?
'sudo apt-get --purge remove python-minimal'
im offline in ubuntu
You are repeating yourself.
will that fix it?
it may.
thanks!  Ill restart and try
